title: (3) Bobrick 819298 Drinking Fountain Grab Bars
item_description:
(3) Bobrick 819298 Drinking Fountain Grab Bars

  • Seller States: New box damage
  • Quantity: 3 
  • Stainless Steel

The B-819298 Stainless steel drinking fountain grab bar increases accessibility and safety. This model is constructed using strong steel tubing that is a 1.5” in diameter. The L-shaped design adds support and is the perfect height for users. The product secured to both the wall and the floor using concealed mounting flanges. Each flange features two anchor points and additional snap flange covers fit over the flanges for a clean and finished look that hides mounting screws.
